EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-05-16- IT Maturity Survey Healthcare Enterprise Send.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: $25 Amazon Gift Card for a 5 Minute Survey | Healthcare IT Maturity Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/NVHBTLR?marketo_cr6r585pkg=[marketo_cr6r585pkg_value]&marketo_nmyg5v1ee8=[marketo_nmyg5v1ee8_value]]]> {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We are aware that you get hundreds of emails each week from vendors, which is why we wanted to take a moment to let you know we understand your time is extremely valuable and extend an offer to partner with you to support a cause that is close to you. We recently launched our Healthcare IT Maturity Survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/NVHBTLR?marketo_cr6r585pkg=[marketo_cr6r585pkg_value]&marketo_nmyg5v1ee8=[marketo_nmyg5v1ee8_value]]]>, to better understand the challenges faced in achieving your IT goals, and are offering a $25 Amazon gift card for completing the 5 minute survey by May 26th. We are also offering $100 Amazon gift card for agreeing to a 30 minute meeting with a Turbonomic engineer (meeting must occur within 10 days of survey submission). If you cannot accept a gift card, we will make a $100 donation to the 501(c)(3) charity of your choice. We look forward to the opportunity to speak with you about the benefits Turbonomic can bring to your infrastructure! <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/NVHBTLR?marketo_cr6r585pkg=[marketo_cr6r585pkg_value]&marketo_nmyg5v1ee8=[marketo_nmyg5v1ee8_value]]]> - The Turbonomic Team
